description: Capacity Development of the GEF Cell at Ministry of Environment and Forests and Support the Scaling up of GEF-UNDP Small Grants Program

subproject.description: Strengthen the institutional capacity of the GEF Cell, set up in the Ministry of Environment and Forests (MoEF) with UNDP support  to assist the Ministry in coordinating GEF related activities in India. This aims at further strengthening the capacity of the Cell to enable India to effectively access, utilize and monitor GEF resources.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Support to GEF Cell

subproject.title: Support to GEF Cell

subproject.description: Support the scaling up and replication initiatives of GEF UNDP Small Grants Program through project development and strengthening the technical as well as institutional capacity of the programme.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Small Grant Programme
